pkgmetadata.longdescription: wheel=====This library is the reference implementation of the Python wheel packagingstandard, as defined in `PEP 427`_.It has two different roles:#. A setuptools_ extension for building wheels that provides the ``bdist_wheel`` setuptools command#. A command line tool for working with wheel filesIt should be noted that wheel is **not** intended to be used as a library, andas such there is no stable, public API... _PEP 427: https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0427/.. _setuptools: https://pypi.org/project/setuptools/Documentation-------------The documentation_ can be found on Read The Docs... _documentation: https://wheel.readthedocs.io/Code of Conduct---------------Everyone interacting in the wheel project's codebases, issue trackers, chatrooms, and mailing lists is expected to follow the `PSF Code of Conduct`_... _PSF Code of Conduct: https://github.com/pypa/.github/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
